files.name: quarterly-report-q1.pdf
files.parsed_content: Q1 Quarterly Report: Revenue grew 18% QoQ. Key highlights include mobile app launch, 50k MAU milestone, and Series A close.

files.name: q2-metrics-dashboard.xlsx
files.parsed_content: Q2 Metrics Dashboard: DAU 12.4k (+23%), Revenue $142k (+18%), Churn 3.2% (-0.5pp). Growth projections for Q3-Q4.

files.name: competitive-analysis-notion.docx
files.parsed_content: Competitive Analysis: Notion AI. Strong: contextual suggestions, inline editing. Weak: no voice input, limited integrations. Opportunity in structured memory.

files.name: board-presentation-q1.pptx
files.parsed_content: Board Presentation Q1 2026: Product milestones, user growth, financial projections, hiring plan. 12 slides.

files.parsed_content: Whiteboard sketch showing microservices topology with API gateway, auth service, and event bus connections.

files.name: onboarding-ideas-voice.m4a
files.parsed_content: Voice memo: Brainstormed ideas for improving first-time user experience. Progressive disclosure, guided tour, value-first onboarding flow.
